SEARCH
Package emissary.output.roller.journal

Class JournaledChannel

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
emissary.output.roller.journal.JournaledChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, ByteChannel, Channel, ReadableByteChannel, SeekableByteChannel, WritableByteChannel
public class JournaledChannel extends OutputStream implements SeekableByteChannel
Wrapper class to allow for use of underlying channel in either OutputStream code or WritableChannel.

      public final void commit() throws IOException
